resources.string: There was an error trying to solve the linear equation system
There is one or more empty fields
There is one or more invalid fields
This app cannot solve this system of linear equations, one of the element in the diagonal and all numbers below it are zero
The system of linear equations has a trivial or non-trivial solution
It was not possible to copy results to clipboard

This app uses the Gauss-Jordan algorithm to solve system of linear equations (n x n). The limitation of 20 unknowns it is to avoid performance issues on the device but the algorithm does not have any limit.
